title: Is it possible to get RP for free from Riot for a Chroma?
body: You know how you can get free RP if it's under 100 and all you have to do is send in art of something League related for some RP, is it possible to buy a Chroma for this request? Because I'm gonna be 22RP off getting the Pink Battle Regalia Poppy chroma when it gets released.

replies.body:
If you do get the RP then it is simply added to your account, and you can do whatever you like with the RP as far as I know.

Remember that this is something Riot does cause they can, and there is no obligation for someone to fulfill your request AND bear in mind you can only do this once.
